---

Please include:
1) Library version
2) Device and OS version
3) Detailed steps to reproduce the issue
4) XML layout and code for BlurView setup, properly formatted
5) Stacktrace in case of a crash
6) Screenshots in case it's a visual issue

Low-effort issues with little to no details will be closed.
